body: Oh I remember when you were just a wee zoea.
Such a long time ago, and it feels it! Y'know my pincers ain't as sharp as they used to be.
I've been running the ranch for an awful while now, but it seems it's just too much of a claw-ful for an old-timer like myself.
But I'll soldier on. I've seen this place through worse!
Like my late wife used to say, once you've made it through an algae bloom you can make it through anything.

option_text: Want to swap for my market stall shell?
body: Hmph. A market stall? - Selling my produce was never my strong suit.
But maybe this old crab can learn some new tricks.
You take good care of my ranch.
Treat her well, and she'll return the favour.
